name: Scroll-inverse
tagline: A tool to inverse the scroll direction of your mouse on Windows 8.
body:
Scroll Inverse
================

A tool to invert the your mouse's wheel scrolling direction on Windows 8.

Download
---------

You can get the it [here](https://github.com/guidj/scroll-inverse/releases/download/v0.1/scroll-inverse-v0.1.rar)
Usage
------

Scroll-Inverse modifies Registry Values. You need to run it with **Administrator** privileges in order
to do that.

After changing the mouse wheel scrolling direction, you need to unplug your device for 5 seconds, and re-plug it in.

Note: This was made based on guide by [Kevin Becker](http://kevinbecker.org/2012/09/17/reverse-scrolling-on-windows-8/)
